category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Import_Spec_Keyword_EXCLUDETYPES
preference.preference_description: Specifies which SpecElement subclasses are restricted from the Import as single subtype list and Use keywords for import list of the Import Spec wizard. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be the internal name of a valid subclass of the SpecElement business object.
